  featured: true
}, {
  id: 9,

  code: "10612",
  stock: 8,
  featured: true
}, {
  id: 10,
  name: "Forever ARGI+®",
  category: "Compléments Alimentaires",
  price: 57500,
  currency: "FCFA",
  image: "/assets/images/produits/Forever ARGI+®.jpg",

  code: "10013",
  stock: 6,
  featured: true
}, {
  id: 11,
  name: "Forever Absorbent-C®",
  category: "Compléments Alimentaires",
  price: 13750,

  image: "/assets/images/produits/Forever Absorbent-C®.jpg",

  stock: 24,
  featured: false
}, {
  id: 12,

  description: "Propolis d'abeille pure, un trésor de la ruche pour soutenir le système immunitaire.",
  code: "10016",
  stock: 14,
  featured: false
}];
export const categories = ["Tous les produits", "Soins & Beauté", "Boissons & Bien-être", "Compléments Alimentaires"];
export const formatPrice = price => {
  return `${price.toLocaleString()} FCFA`;
};
export const getFeaturedProducts = () => {
  return products.filter(product => product.featured);
};
export const getProductsByCategory = category => {
  if (category === "Tous les produits") return products;
  return products.filter(product => product.category === category);
};

sourcesContent:
export const products = [
  {
    id: 1,
    name: "Forever Aloe First® Spray",
    category: "Soins & Beauté",
    price: 15000,
    currency: "FCFA",
    image: "/assets/images/produits/Forever Aloe First® Spray.jpg",
    description: "Spray apaisant et rafraîchissant à l'Aloe Vera pour les brûlures, coupures et irritations cutanées.",
    code: "10605",
    stock: 18,
    featured: true
  },
  {
    id: 2,
    name: "Aloe Heat Lotion",
    category: "Soins & Beauté",
    price: 11500,
    currency: "FCFA",
    image: "/assets/images/produits/Aloe Heat Lotion.jpg",
    description: "Lotion chauffante thérapeutique à base d'Aloe Vera pour soulager les muscles endoloris.",

    stock: 22,

  {

    name: "Forever Aloe Liquid Soap®",

  {

    code: "10594",
    stock: 35,
    featured: false
  },
  {
    id: 6,
    name: "Forever Bright® Toothgel",
    category: "Soins & Beauté",
    price: 12500,
    currency: "FCFA",
    image: "/assets/images/produits/Forever Bright® Toothgel.jpg",
    description: "Dentifrice à l'Aloe Vera sans fluor, au goût mentholé frais pour des dents saines.",
    code: "10604",
    stock: 28,
    featured: true
  },
  {
    id: 7,
    name: "Forever Aloe Berry Nectar®",
    category: "Boissons & Bien-être",
    price: 21000,
    currency: "FCFA",
    image: "/assets/images/produits/Forever Aloe Berry Nectar®.jpg",
    description: "Boisson savoureuse combinant le gel pur d'Aloe Vera à la pulpe de pomme et cranberry.",
    code: "10607",
    stock: 12,
    featured: true
  },
  {
    id: 8,
    name: "Forever Freedom®",
    category: "Boissons & Bien-être",
    price: 28500,
    currency: "FCFA",
    image: "/assets/images/produits/Forever Freedom®.jpg",
    description: "Boisson à l'Aloe Vera enrichie en glucosamine et chondroïtine pour les articulations.",
    code: "10608",
    stock: 10,
    featured: true
  },
  {
    id: 9,
    name: "Forever Vital 5® Aloe Gel",
    category: "Boissons & Bien-être",
    price: 29000,
    currency: "FCFA",
    image: "/assets/images/produits/Forever Vital 5® Aloe Gel.jpg",
    description: "Gel d'Aloe Vera pur stabilisé à boire, le produit phare de Forever pour la digestion.",
    code: "10612",
    stock: 8,
    featured: true
  },
  {
    id: 10,
    name: "Forever ARGI+®",
    category: "Compléments Alimentaires",
    price: 57500,
    currency: "FCFA",
    image: "/assets/images/produits/Forever ARGI+®.jpg",
    description: "Complément alimentaire à base de L-Arginine pour la circulation sanguine et l'énergie.",
    code: "10013",
    stock: 6,
    featured: true
  },
  {
    id: 11,
    name: "Forever Absorbent-C®",
    category: "Compléments Alimentaires",
    price: 13750,
    currency: "FCFA",
    image: "/assets/images/produits/Forever Absorbent-C®.jpg",
    description: "Vitamine C avec extrait d'avoine pour une absorption optimale et le système immunitaire.",
    code: "10009",
    stock: 24,
    featured: false
  },
  {
    id: 12,
    name: "Forever Daily®",
    category: "Compléments Alimentaires",
    price: 15000,
    currency: "FCFA",
    image: "/assets/images/produits/Forever Daily®.jpg",
    description: "Complexe multivitaminé et minéral complet pour les besoins nutritionnels quotidiens.",

    stock: 18,
    featured: false
  },
  {
    id: 13,
    name: "Forever Immublend®",
    category: "Compléments Alimentaires",
    price: 17500,
    currency: "FCFA",
    image: "/assets/images/produits/Forever Immublend®.jpg",
    description: "Complexe de champignons médicinaux et plantes adaptogènes pour l'immunité.",
    code: "10022",
    stock: 16,
    featured: false
  },
  {
    id: 14,
    name: "Forever Bee Propolis®",
    category: "Compléments Alimentaires",
    price: 25500,
    currency: "FCFA",
    image: "/assets/images/produits/Forever Bee Propolis®.jpg",
    description: "Propolis d'abeille pure, un trésor de la ruche pour soutenir le système immunitaire.",
    code: "10016",
    stock: 14,
    featured: false
  }
];

export const categories = [
  "Tous les produits",
  "Soins & Beauté",
  "Boissons & Bien-être",
  "Compléments Alimentaires"
];

export const formatPrice = (price) => {
  return `${price.toLocaleString()} FCFA`;
};

export const getFeaturedProducts = () => {
  return products.filter(product => product.featured);
};

export const getProductsByCategory = (category) => {
  if (category === "Tous les produits") return products;
  return products.filter(product => product.category === category);
};
